name: Minotaur
description: Minotaurs are strong-framed humanoids with heads resembling those of bulls. Their horns range in size from a foot to three feet long.

traits.name: Ability Score Increase
traits.description: Your Strength score increases by 2, and your Constitution score increases by 1.

traits.name: Speed
traits.description: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

traits.name: Horns
traits.description: Your horns are natural melee weapons, which you can use to make unarmed strikes. If you hit with them, you deal piercing damage equal to 1d6 + your Strength modifier.

traits.name: Goring Rush
traits.description: Immediately after you use the Dash action on your turn and move at least 20 feet, you can make one melee attack with your horns as a bonus action.

traits.name: Hammering Horns
traits.description: Immediately after you hit a creature with a melee attack as a bonus action on your turn, you can attempt to shove that creature with your horns. The creature must be no more than one size larger than you and within 5 feet of you. It must make a Strength saving throw (DC 8 + your proficiency bonus + your Strength modifier) or be pushed up to 10 feet away from you.

traits.name: Imposing Presence
traits.description: You have proficiency in one of the following skills of your choice: Intimidation or Persuasion.
